greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n+1)=a(n)-n^2 if positive and new, else a(n+1)=a(n)+n^2; a(0)=1.
link: Indranil Ghosh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..50000 (terms 0..240 from R. Zumkeller)
Index entries for sequences related to Recamán's sequence.
